location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shiraz, to Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires, Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a letter (not present) from the Chief Secretary to the Bombay Government; this letter provided authorisation for the Resident to make occasional visits to Shiraz (also spelt Shauraz), provided they do not interfere with the views of the British representative at Tehran.
